name: The Ultimate Doctor
description:
The Ultimate Doctor

Save as many lives as possible, it's your job to do that.

Made this game in one day so it might be bad hehe (; (I was inspired by a helping people from covid game so i thought why not make a game like that but more different hehe )

Join thr discord to suggest stuff and chill! https://discord.com/invite/zYyCrmA

Controls: Left and Right arrow keys to move.

How to play?

Get hearts(people) and bring them to the hospital.

A new update is here cheers! (Version 1.1.1)
